LanguageData.KUA_MultiSelectDesc: Various selection tools for this item type. Hold shift to ignore stuff
LanguageData.KUA_SelectOnScreenWithStuff: Select similar items on screen made from {0}
LanguageData.KUA_SelectOnMapWithStuff: Select similar items on map made from {0}
LanguageData.KUA_SelectInRectWithStuff: Select similar items in rect made from {0}
LanguageData.KUA_HarvestGrownDesc: Tools to harvest only grown plants
LanguageData.KUA_HarvestOnScreen: Harvest all fully grown on screen
LanguageData.KUA_HarvestOnMap: Harvest all fully grown on map
LanguageData.KUA_CutGrownDesc: Tools to cut only grown plants
LanguageData.KUA_CutGrownOnScreen: Cut all fully grown on screen
LanguageData.KUA_CutGrownOnMap: Cut all fully grown on map
LanguageData.KAU_ToggleAllowFinishOffOnFriendly: Allow finish off on friendly pawns
LanguageData.KAU_ToggleNoHauling: Disable No Hauling Designator and Gizmos
LanguageData.KUA_SelectSimilarDesc: Selects items similar to those already selected
LanguageData.KAU_DefErrorLogToolTip: Logs the source of any def errors in a new log-line after the error
LanguageData.KAU_DisableMeleeRequirementForFinishOff: Disable Melee requirement for finish off
LanguageData.KAU_DesignatorGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow a certain kind of plant that only targets fertile tiles.
LanguageData.KAU_StripMineDesc: Mine a grid rather than everything
LanguageData.KUA_NoHaulDesc: Prevents this item from being hauled to e.g. stockpiles. This does not prevent the items being hauled to work - e.g. resources to a toolbench, or being used by a recipe at the toolbench
